snippet: Women occupied nearly 18 percent of the top slots, according to a Harvard Business Review study that examined the career trajectories, education levels and diversity among the 1,000 top-tier executives.
abstract: Women occupied nearly 18 percent of the top slots, according to a Harvard Business Review study that examined the career trajectories, education levels and diversity among the 1,000 top-tier executives.

headline.main: More Women and Foreign-Educated Executives Enter Top Ranks, Study Finds
